name: veracity-azureb2c-authentication
description: This application demonstrates how to perform authentication and work with the Veracity API interface.

scripts.gencert: rimraf ./cert && mkdir cert && openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -sha256 -nodes -keyout ./cert/key.pem -out ./cert/cert.pem -subj "/CN=localhost" -days 3650

author: DNV GL
